name: FEEDER_AUDIT
title: FEEDER_AUDIT
description: The `FEEDER_AUDIT` class defines the semantics of an audit trail which is constructed to describe the origin of data that have been transformed into openEHR form and committed to the system.

element.short: The `FEEDER_AUDIT` class defines the semantics of an audit trail which is constructed to describe the origin of data that have been transformed into openEHR form and committed to the system.
element.definition: The `FEEDER_AUDIT` class defines the semantics of an audit trail which is constructed to describe the origin of data that have been transformed into openEHR form and committed to the system.

element.short: Identifiers used for the item in the originating system, e.
element.definition: Identifiers used for the item in the originating system, e.g. filler and placer ids.

element.short: Identifiers used for the item in the feeder system, where the feeder system is distinct from the originating system.
element.definition: Identifiers used for the item in the feeder system, where the feeder system is distinct from the originating system.

element.short: Optional inline inclusion of or reference to original content corresponding to the openEHR content at this node.
element.definition: Optional inline inclusion of or reference to original content corresponding to the openEHR content at this node. Typically a URI reference to a document or message in a persistent store associated with the EHR.

element.short: Any audit information for the information item from the originating system.
element.definition: Any audit information for the information item from the originating system.

element.short: Any audit information for the information item from the feeder system, if different from the originating system.
element.definition: Any audit information for the information item from the feeder system, if different from the originating system.
